turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Screamplay.
turn.2: Screamplay Screamplay is a 1985 American horror film directed by Rufus Butler Seder.
turn.4: Aspiring screenwriter Edgar Allen (Rufus B. Seder) arrives in Hollywood carrying his most valuable possessions: a battered suitcase and a typewriter.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Edgar Allen's best attribute is his wild imagination.
turn.7: What happens with his wild imagination?
turn.8: He imagines scenes so vividly for the murder mystery he is writing that they seem to come to life... and they do!
turn.9: What do they do with his imagination?
turn.10: As mysterious gruesome murders pile up, Edgar Allen must confront aging actresses, rock stars and the police in a bleak setting of broken dreams and hideously broken bodies in Hollywood.
turn.12: As the line between reality and imagination becomes more blurred, Edgar Allen, convinced the only way to be a real writer is to suffer, is driven slowly mad.
